extracted_playbook.title: Apply Schneider Electric Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement Schneider Electric's recommended mitigations to reduce the risk of exploit.

extracted_playbook.title: Open Project Files from Trusted Sources Only
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that project files are only opened if they are received from a trusted source.

extracted_playbook.title: Compute and Verify Hash of Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Compute a hash of the project files and regularly check the consistency of this hash to verify the integrity before usage.

extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt and Restrict Access to Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Encrypt project files when stored and restrict access to only trusted users.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Communication Protocols for File Exchange
extracted_playbook.description: When exchanging files over the network, use secure communication protocols.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow SCADAPackTM Security Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Adhere to the SCADAPackTM Security Guidelines to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply CISA Defensive Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement CISA's recommended defensive measures to minimize the risk of exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Implement measures to protect against social engineering attacks, such as avoiding clicking web links or opening attachments in unsolicited emails.
